data.message: Mark Zuckerberg, I doubt you will see this, but I'm tired of seeing the same posts over and over when i get off Facebook and go back on in a few minutes. Is there a way that you can have the development team implement a "read" and "unread" option like emails so that when it is read the next unread post shows up first the next time you open the app on your phone? Thanks!

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Shane! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1IRe2xM.  -Jordan
